body.name: Lightweight Stroller, Convenience Stroller with 360 Degree Rotational Seat, Baby Toddler Stroller for Travel, Multi Position Recline, Ultra Compact Fold & Airplane Ready Travel Stroller
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 14 hrs 45 mins
features: Lightweight Baby Stroller: The baby stroller is easy one-hand folding with auto-lock, making this travel stroller easy to carry and store in your car trunk or overhead bin

Multi-functional Baby Stroller: Our baby stroller with bassinet has 360-degree swivel wheels and front wheels, which can be rotated freely, and the back wheels can be locked for easy maneuverability. The adjustable backrest and footrest provide a comfortable space for your baby to sit or lie down. The removable canopy with a peek-a-boo window offers shade from the sun and protects your baby from the wind

Baby Stroller with Storage Basket: This baby stroller with bassinet has a storage basket under the seat, providing ample space for your diaper bag and other necessities. The stroller seat can be reclined to multiple positions, suitable for babies from newborn to 3 years old. Our stroller for baby with bassinet is perfect for families on the go

Baby Stroller with Adjustable Handlebar: This baby stroller with bassinet has an adjustable handlebar, which can be adjusted to 2 different heights according to the needs of parents. The ergonomic handle design makes it comfortable to push and steer, reducing wrist fatigue. The baby stroller is easy to assemble, and all tools are included

productInformation.value: #14,395 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #49 in Lightweight Baby Strollers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxury on a Budget
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The design is beautiful and for the price you literally cannot ask for more. I don’t understand why it is priced as fairly as it is to be honest. I bought it for a vacation/cruise but I can already tell it’s going to be my daily stroller for my six month old. It is so many features and it is much more compact than my Graco.It also came 90% of the way put together. I wouldn’t describe it as super lightweight but I don’t think it’s heavy either. I’m not kidding when I say the quality is outrageous for the price. I can’t imagine that it will do super well on terrain but I haven’t tried it yet.One of the other reviews said that the handle is flimsy. It’s not flimsy in my opinion but not the strongest either. I was not paid nor encouraged to write this review I just felt like the reviews scared me a little and I’m really happy I bought it regardless of some of them.10/10 recommend. Can’t recommend enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really nice product, perfect size, but the only problem is the folding mechanism. The pull strap doesn't work as described by the seller. In regular situations you can make it work, but is you are in a hurry is a real inconvenience.I returned this item and it was easy and without delays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good stroller
reviews.reviewText: The instructions dont explain so good how to close the stroller, after giving up on closing it i figured it out. You have to press the handle button to close it completely. Its very easy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy bonita carreola y fácil de doblar
reviews.reviewText: Esta es una muy bonita carreola muy compacta y liviana tenía un poco de temor al encargarla por que muchos comentarios decían que no pudieron doblar la carreola pero es muy fácil en m o minutos encontré la manera solo ahí que presionar el botón que es para subir y bajar donde se dirige la carreola. Lo preciosas y bajas sin soltar ya estando asta abajo preciomas acia el piso y se dobla fácilmente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Front Buckle is very very difficult to use
reviews.reviewText: Stroller is good but the front buckle if very difficult to put on. We have used it many times and every time it is a struggle to buckle up the kid. He always ends up crying because it takes so long to buckle up. It’s a complicated design and there are no instructions on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does not collapse
reviews.reviewText: The stroller itself is nice however The one I received will not fold down I follow instructions and can’t get it to fold down at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is not light weight. It has some weight to it especially if you’re trying to carry it with one hand and with a baby in the next. It is also very difficult to fold down it says it’s like one hand fold but it’s not, it actually took me a day to figure out how to fold it down and I was super excited. The instructions tell you but they’re a little confusing. Other then that it’s a nice stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best travel stroller
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase for traveling! Got through the airport smoothly and it’s so compact when closed. Baby loves it!
